channel.title: Space on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in Space on Ex Machina

item.title: GPS is a Time Machine
item.description: Today most of the systems that we rely on across all walks of life rely on the ability to accurately synchronise time across a range of different sub-systems. Most such applications rely on the precision of GPS based time. But since the US controls all of the GPS satellites the rest of the world is beholden to it in ways we do not really fathom.
